name: Math Blaster: Ages 9-12
description:
CD image is available at archive.org:
https://archive.org/details/Math_Blaster_Ages_9-12_Davidson_1997
notes: The game seems to crash after a while.
content:
exe: $DISC/teaser.exe
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: teaser.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    description: Copying files...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Mb9_12/mb9_12/
    src: $DISC/mb9_12/
